channel.title: ScriptScape® Project By NAH Coding Team® Join Please! (Development)
channel.description:
[b]Project:[/b] ScriptScape® Source [b]Basic Source:[/b] No one yet i think testscape or cheezscape
[b]Developers:[/b] [b]NAH Coding Team®:[/b] scriptscape (NAH Or Nick Ajax Hardcore)
[b]Others:[/b]
[b]More Information[/b] I Need More Developers To Build A Great Source With Me
[b]Minimal Requirements:[/b] You Need To Know Atleast Java Or Visual C Or C+ Or C++ Or An Advanced Graphics Maker
[b]How To Join?[/b] Make A Topic Here With The Layout I've Made Or Pm Me With My Layout Or E-mail To nick_ajax_hardcore@hotmail.com With The Layout
[b]Layout:[/b] First Name: Your First Name (Nick) Nick Name: Your Nickname (NAH) Knowledge: Java,Visual Or Graphics (Java) NAH Coding Team®: Yes Or No (Do You Want To Join My Coding Team (yes) Or Just Help With Source (NO))
Thanks For Taking The Time To Read This Topic.
-=Nick Ajax Hardcore=-
©2007 NAH Coding Team.All Rights Reserved.

item.description:

domo9122:

You have already advertised this because i have just downloaded your tutorial…how did you make that tutorial anyway?

I Advertised About NAH Coding Team®
Not About ScriptScape®

[quote=“sonjichan, post:3, topic:62204”]And what makes scriptscape different from all the other projects?

Just curious. :)[/quote]
I Want To Delete All The Bugs
And Make It Like Basic RuneScape
Etc

Enough Info??

-=Nick Ajax Hardcore=-
